pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.2: the nun Thullanandā went wandering without first relinquishing her lodging.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.3: Soon afterwards her lodging caught fire.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.8: She’ll just make us responsible for anything that gets lost.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.9: When Thullanandā returned to her lodging, she asked the nuns,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.10: “Venerables, I hope you removed my things?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.13: “How could the nuns not remove the contents when a lodging is burning?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.14: But the nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.15: “How could Venerable Thullanandā go wandering without relinquishing her lodging?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.16: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.19: “How could the nun Thullanandā do this?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.21: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.22.1: ‘If a nun goes wandering without relinquishing her lodging, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.1.6: one with a door is what is meant.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.1.8: if she crosses the boundary of an enclosed lodging without first relinquishing it to a nun, a trainee nun, or a novice nun, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.1.9: If she goes beyond the vicinity of an unenclosed lodging, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.2.1: If it has not been relinquished, and she perceives that it has not, and she goes, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.2.2: If it has not been relinquished, but she is unsure of it, and she goes, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.2.3: If it has not been relinquished, but she perceives that it has, and she goes, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.2.4: If she does not relinquish a lodging without a door, and then goes, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.2.5: If it has been relinquished, but she perceives that it has not, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.2.6: If it has been relinquished, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.2.7: If it has been relinquished, and she perceives that it has, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.3.2: if she relinquishes it and then goes;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.3.4: if she searches, but is unable to find anyone to relinquish it to;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.3.8: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.3.9: The eighth training rule is finished.
